A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointing movie. Disney has decided to rewrite and establish a different star wars universe\, effectively erasing what it means to be Sith and Jedi. While artistically and beautifully shot (with many scenes stylistically giving homage to the original movies) good/evil have been redefined from more obvious\, cut/dry\, light/dark to using your own discretion. It definitely does not \"honor the saga's rich legacy\" because it moves on from it\, rather than continuing it.
